resources.string: Accept the terrible responsibility of life with eyes wide open.

eyes wide open.
Change the text size of quote and author according to your preference. Note: Preview may vary from actual home screen widget.
Change the alignment of quote and author according to your preference.
Set the quote and author text style.
Set the font of quote and author. According to your preference
Set quote language according to your preference.
Set the color of quote and author. Note: Select black color if you have a dark background wallpaper.
हम ने अक्सर तुम्हारी राहों में,रुक कर अपना ही इंतिज़ार किया।
Kwowt (Quote) is an app that let\'s add quote widget to home screen. The quotes are available in two languages English and Hindi
Note : Widget will update in every 2 hours.
